solution_line_template: When Jayson is {jayson_age} his dad is {jayson_age} x {dad_times_jayson} = <<{jayson_age}*{dad_times_jayson}={dad_age}>>{dad_age} years old.
When Jayson is born, his mom is {mom_age} - {jayson_age} = <<{mom_age}-{jayson_age}={mom_age_when_jayson_born}>>{mom_age_when_jayson_born} years old.
